Cerradura dimensional intenta contrarrestar cualquier intento de convocar a una criatura al área, pero no impide que dicha criatura se vaya cuando la convocación acaba.

entries.name: Dimensional Steps
entries.description:
You teleport to a location up to 20 feet away within your line of sight.

Heightened (+1) The distance you can teleport increases by 5 feet.

entries.name: Dinosaur Form
entries.description:
You channel the primal forces of nature to transform into a Large animal battle form, specifically that of a powerful and terrifying dinosaur. You must have space to expand or the spell is lost. When you cast this spell, choose ankylosaurus, brontosaurus, deinonychus, stegosaurus, triceratops, or tyrannosaurus. You can decide the specific type of animal, but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the animal and dinosaur traits. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and your damage bonus is +9. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +18, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.0Cyf07wboRp4CmcQ]{Ankylosaurus}
    • Speed 25 feet;
    • Melee 1 tail (backswing, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d6 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2d6 bludgeoning.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.KkDRRDuycXwKPa6n]{Brontosaurus}
    • Speed 25 feet;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 15 feet), Damage 2d6 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2d8 bludgeoning.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.oJbcmpBSHwmx6FD4]{Deinonychus}
    • Speed 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 talon (agile), Damage 2d4 piercing plus [[/r {1}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage};
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 1d10 piercing.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.T6XnxvsgvvOrpien]{Stegosaurus}
    • Speed 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d8 piercing.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.iOKhr2El8R6cz6YI]{Triceratops}
    • Speed 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 horn, Damage 2d8 piercing, plus @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success] on a critical hit;
    • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2d6 bludgeoning.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.542Keo6txtq7uvqe]{Tyrannosaurus}
    • Speed 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws (deadly, reach 10 feet), Damage 1d12 piercing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 1d10 bludgeoning.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Huge and your attacks have 15-foot reach, or 20-foot reach if they started with 15-foot reach. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +18, a damage bonus of +6, double the damage dice, and Athletics +21.

Heightened (7th) Your battle form is Gargantuan and your attacks have 20-foot reach, or 25-foot reach if they started with 15-foot reach. You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 25 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +25, a damage bonus of +15, double the damage dice, and Athletics +25.

entries.name: Dinosaur Fort
entries.description:
You conjure a primeval fort with walls of sharpened wood adorned with dinosaur skin and teeth, up to 300 feet on a side. Each of the four quadrants of the fort is guarded by a @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.LDQpLwN40OGefZD0]{Tyrannosaurus}. While the tyrannosauruses won't cross into the others' territories, their reach allows them to simultaneously attack an intruder near the center of the fort. The tyrannosauruses leave you and anyone you introduce to them alone but treat anyone else they find in the fort as intruders and prospective snacks. When you prepare spells, you can choose not to recover the spell slot you used to cast this spell. If you do, the fort remains for another 24 hours.

The fort must be created on a plot of land free of other structures. It adapts to the natural terrain, adopting the structural requirements for being built there. The fort adjusts around small features, such as ponds or spires of rock, but can't be created on water or other nonsolid surfaces. If created on snow, sand dunes, or other soft surfaces with a solid surface underneath, the foundation reaches solid ground. If created on a solid but unstable surface, such as a swamp or an area plagued by tremors, roll a @Check[type:flat|dc:3] each day the fort is present; on a failure, the fort sinks or collapses sometime during that day, and the spell ends.

The fort doesn't harm creatures within the area when it appears, and it can't be created within a crowd or in a densely populated area. Any creature inadvertently caught inside the fort when the spell is cast ends up unharmed inside the complete fort and always has a clear path of escape.

entries.name: Dirge of Doom
entries.description: Foes within the area are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}. They can't reduce their Frightened value below 1 while they remain in the area.

entries.name: Desaparición
entries.description: Escudas a una criatura de los sentidos de otros. El objetivo queda @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{No Detectado} , no tan sólo a la vista sino a todos los sentidos, lo que le permite contar como @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} sean cuales sean los sentidos precisos e imprecisos de que disponga un observador. Sigue siendo posible que una criatura encuentre al objetivo Buscando, gracias al polvo removido, a encontrar huecos en el espectro de sonido o a encontrar alguna otra forma de descubrir la presencia de una criatura por lo demás indetectable.

entries.name: Discernir Mentiras
entries.description: Las falsedades resuenan en tus oídos como notas discordantes. Obtienes un bonificador +4 por estatus a las pruebas de Percepción cuando alguien miente.

entries.name: Discernir Ubicación
entries.description: Averiguas el nombre y la ubicación exacta del objetivo (incluyendo el edificio, comunidad y país) y plano de existencia. Solamente puedes designar como objetivo a una criatura si la has visto en persona, si dispones de una pertenencia significativa de la misma o de una parte de su cuerpo. Para designar como objetivo a un objeto, debes haberlo tocado o disponer de un fragmento del mismo. Discernir ubicación supera automáticamente las protecciones contra la detección y la adivinación de nivel menor de este conjuro, incluso si normalmente tendrían alguna posibilidad de bloquearlo.

entries.name: Discern Secrets
entries.description:
You call upon your patron's power to better uncover secrets.

When you Cast the Spell, the target can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive}. The target gains a +1 status bonus to the skill or Perception used for the roll, and this bonus remains as long as you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustain the Spell}.

The target is temporarily immune to discern secrets for 1 minute.

Heightened (5th) You can target two creatures instead of one.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.hdOb5Iu6Zd3pHoGI]{Spell Effect: Discern Secrets (Recall Knowledge)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.m1tQTBrolf7uZBW0]{Spell Effect: Discern Secrets (Seek)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.dEsaufFnfYihu5Ex]{Spell Effect: Discern Secrets (Sense Motive)}

entries.name: Desintegrar
entries.description:
Disparas un rayo de color verde contra tu objetivo. Haz un ataque de conjuro. Infliges 12d10 daño y el objetivo debe hacer una salvación básica de Fortaleza. Con un impacto crítico, tratas el resultado de la salvación como un grado peor. Una criatura reducida a 0 PG se convierte en un polvillo fino; su equipo permanece. Un objeto impactado por este conjuro quedará destruido (sin salvación alguna), sea cual sea su Dureza, a menos que se trate de un artefacto o de algo similarmente difícil de destruir. Un solo lanzamiento no puede destruir más de un cubo de materia de 10 pies (3 m) de lado. Esto destruye automáticamente cualquier cosa construida mediante fuerza, como por ejemplo un muro de fuerza.
Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 2d10.

entries.name: Disyunción
entries.description: Una energía crujiente desune el objetivo. Intentas contrarrestarlo (pág. 458). Si tienes éxito, queda desactivado durante 1 semana. Con un éxito crítico, queda destruido. Si se trata de un artefacto u objeto similar, fallas automáticamente.

entries.name: Dismantle
entries.description:
You touch an object, and it immediately disassembles itself into its component pieces. The spell fails if the target lacks component pieces (such as a statue carved from one block of stone), and using it on a dangerous object like a snare or trap typically triggers it. The object gains the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Broken} condition, and the component pieces become small enough to be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} under normal clothing and armor. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the spell. When the spell ends, the object reassembles itself into its original form, appearing in your hand or hands if you have them free, or on the ground in front of you otherwise. Once reassembled, the object loses the Broken condition and its Hit Points return to the value the object had when you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast the Spell}.

Heightened (4th) The spell lasts for 10 minutes.

Heightened (6th) The spell lasts until your next daily preparations.

entries.name: Disipar Magia
entries.description: Destejes la magia que hay tras un conjuro o efecto. Haz una prueba de contrarrestar contra el objetivo (pág. 458). Si tienes éxito contra un efecto de conjuro, acabas con el mismo si no se dice lo contrario. Si tienes éxito contra un objeto mágico, el objeto se convierte en un objeto mundano de su mismo tipo durante 10 minutos. Esto no cambia las propiedades no mágicas del objeto. Si el objetivo es un artefacto u objeto similar, fallas automáticamente.

entries.name: Disperse into Air
entries.description:
Trigger You take damage from an enemy or a hazard.

After taking the triggering damage, you transform into air. Until the end of the current turn, you can't be attacked or targeted, you don't take up space, you can't act, and any auras or emanations you have are suppressed. At the end of the turn, you re-form in any space you can occupy within 15 feet of where you were when you dispersed. Any auras or emanations you had are restored as long as their duration didn't run out while you were dispersed.

entries.name: Perturbar muertos vivientes
entries.description:
Alanceas al objetivo con energía. Infliges 1d6 daño positivo más tu modificador por característica de lanzamiento de conjuros. El objetivo debe llevar a cabo una salvación básica de Fortaleza. Si la criatura falla críticamente la salvación, queda también @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7 {Debilitada 1}1 durante 1 asalto.
Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d6.

entries.name: Armas Disruptoras
entries.description:
Infundes armas con energía positiva. Los ataques con dichas armas infligen 1d4 daño positivo adicional a los muertos vivientes.
Potenciado (3º) El daño se incrementa a 2d4.
Potenciado (5º) Puedes designar como objetivo hasta tres armas, y el daño se incrementa a 3d4.
@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.X7RD0JRxhJV9u2LC]{Spell Effect: Armas Disruptoras}

entries.name: Distracting Chatter
entries.description:
You bombard a target with distracting auditory illusions, surrounding them with a tumultuous cacophony of overlapping speech, whispers, screams, and muttering. The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}, takes a -2 status penalty to purely auditory Perception checks, and must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] to use auditory abilities or verbal spell components. Similarly, a creature who attempts to affect the target with an auditory effect must succeed at a DC 5 flat check or the attempt fails. The duration depends on the target's Will save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The duration is 1 round.

Failure The duration is 3 rounds.

Critical Failure The duration is 1 minute.

Heightened (7th) You can target up to five creatures.

entries.name: Div Pact
entries.description:
You call upon the powers of Abaddon to grant you the assistance of a div. You call upon a div whose level can be no more than double div pact's spell level, two divs whose levels are each at least 2 less than double the spell level, or three divs whose levels are each at least 3 less than double the spell level.

Critical Success You conjure the div or divs, and they require nothing in return for their service.

Success You conjure the div or divs. They are not eager to pursue the task, so they require a favor in return.

Failure you don't conjure any divs.

Critical Failure You don't conjure any divs, and they send a spiritual backlash that denies your use of any of your innate divine spells for 24 hours. If you are under the effect of any of your innate divine spells, the durations end.

entries.name: Dividing Trench
entries.description:
You dig an earthen trench across the surrounding terrain, which must be soil, clay, sand, or other soft earth, but not flooring or stone. The trench is 5 feet wide, 5 feet deep, and up to 15 feet long. You can shape the trench's path, but it must be one continuous line. You must conjure the trench in an open space so it doesn't pass through any creatures or objects. Creatures inside the trench have cover from creatures outside the trench, and creatures outside the trench have cover from creatures inside the trench. Particularly small creatures in the trench might have more cover against other creatures who aren't close to the trench's edge, and in turn, those creatures might have more cover against small creatures in the trench; the GM determines the amount of additional cover, if any. Entering or leaving the trench requires an additional 5 feet of movement but doesn't require any kind of check and isn't considered difficult terrain. At the end of the spell's duration, the trench disappears and all creatures in the trench remain in their spaces on solid ground.

Heightened (+2) The trench's maximum length increases by 15 feet.

entries.name: Divine Armageddon
entries.description:
You call forth a divine cataclysm from your deity, destroying living and undead creatures in the area alike. Creatures in the area take 10d6 Negative Damage and [[/r 10d6]] alignment damage (good, evil, lawful, or chaotic), chosen from among the alignments your deity has. If your deity is true neutral, increase the negative damage by [[/r {4d6}[negative]]]{4d6 Negative Damage} instead of dealing alignment damage. A creature harmed by positive damage, such as one with negative healing, takes positive damage instead of negative damage from this spell.

You can't cast this spell if you don't have a deity. This spell gains the trait corresponding to the alignment damage dealt.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6 negative damage, [[/r 1d6]] alignment damage, and 1d6 additional negative and positive damage for a true neutral deity.

entries.name: Aura Divina
entries.description:
El poder divino custodia a los objetivos, concediendo a cada uno de ellos un bonificador +1 por estatus a la CA y a las salvaciones mientras se encuentra en el área. Elige un componente de alineamiento de los que tiene tu dios (caótico, maligno, bueno, o legal). No puedes lanzar este conjuro si careces de dios o si tu dios es neutral absoluto. El conjuro obtiene el rasgo del alineamiento elegido. Los bonificadores concedidos por el conjuro se incrementan a +2 contra los ataques de criaturas con un alineamiento opuesto al mismo (legales si has elegido caótico o malignas si has elegido bueno) y los efectos creados por ellas. Estos bonificadores se incrementan hasta +4 contra efectos creados por las criaturas que intentan imponer el estado de @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlado} a un objetivo de tu aura divina, así como contra ataques hechos por criaturas convocadas por cualquier ser de alineamiento opuesto a tu aura divina.
Cuando una criatura de alineamiento opuesto acierta a un objetivo con un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo, ésta debe tener éxito en una salvación de Voluntad o quedar @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Cegada} durante 1 minuto. A continuación, queda temporalmente inmune durante 1 minuto.
La primera vez que Mantienes el conjuro cada asalto, el radio del aura divina crece 10 pies (3 m).

entries.name: Decreto Divino
entries.description:
Entonas una potente letanía de tu fe, un mandato que daña a quienes se oponen a tus ideales. Elige un componente de alineamiento de los que tiene tu dios (caótico, maligno, bueno, o legal). No puedes lanzar este conjuro si careces de dios o si tu dios es neutral absoluto. El conjuro obtiene el rasgo del alineamiento elegido. Infliges 7d10 de daño a las criaturas en el área; cada criatura debe hacer una salvación de Fortaleza. Las criaturas con un alineamiento que encaja con el elegido por ti no se ven afectadas por el conjuro. Las que ni encajan ni se oponen al mismo tratan el resultado de su tirada de salvación como un grado mejor y no sufren otros efectos que el daño.
Éxito crítico La criatura no resulta afectada.
Éxito La criatura sufre mitad de daño.
Fallo La criatura sufre daño completo y queda @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitada 2} durante 1 minuto.
Fallo crítico La criatura sufre doble daño y queda @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitada 2} durante 1 minuto. En tu Plano natal, una criatura que sufre un fallo crítico queda @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.bay4AfSu2iIozNNW]{Desterrada} con el mismo efecto de una salvación fallida contra destierro. Una criatura de 10º nivel o menor debe hacer una salvación de Voluntad. Con un fallo, queda @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralizada} durante 1 minuto; con un fallo crítico, muere.
Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d10 y el nivel de las criaturas que deben hacer una segunda salvación con un fallo crítico se incrementa en 2.

entries.name: Inspiración Divina
entries.description: Infundes a un objetivo con energía espiritual, renovando su magia. Si prepara conjuros, recupera un conjuro de 6º nivel o menor lanzado previamente ese mismo día y puede lanzarlo de nuevo. Si lanza conjuros espontáneamente, recupera uno de sus espacios de conjuro de 6º nivel o menor. Si dispone de reserva de foco, recupera sus Puntos de Foco como si se hubiera Reenfocado.

entries.name: Lanza Divina
entries.description:
Desatas un rayo de energía divina. Elige un componente de alineamiento de los que tiene tu dios (caótico, maligno, bueno, o legal). No puedes lanzar este conjuro si careces de dios o si tu dios es neutral absoluto. Haz una tirada de ataque de conjuro a distancia contra la CA del objetivo. Con un impacto, el objetivo sufre tanto daño del tipo de alineamiento elegido como 1d4 + tu modificador por característica de lanzamiento de conjuros (doble daño en un impacto crítico). El conjuro obtiene el rasgo del alineamiento elegido.
Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d4.
Potenciado (9º) El escudo tiene Dureza 25.

entries.name: Divine Plagues
entries.description:
Your deity sends wracking plagues. The target must attempt a Fortitude save. When you Cast the Spell, decide whether the disease inflicts the Clumsy, Enfeebled, or Stupefied condition.

Divine Plague (disease) Level 1

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}, and Clumsy 1, Enfeebled 1, or Stupefied 1 (1 round)

Stage 3 Clumsy 1, Enfeebled 1, or Stupefied 1 and the target can't recover from the condition until they are cured (1 day)

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target is afflicted with divine plague at stage 1.

Critical Failure The target is afflicted with divine plague at stage 2.

Heightened (5th) The divine plague disease gains the virulent trait. The condition value for the Clumsy, Enfeebled, or Stupefied condition is 2 instead of 1.

entries.name: Receptáculo Divino
entries.description:
Aceptas energías de otro mundo en tu cuerpo; si bien sigues siendo reconocible como tú mismo, obtienes los rasgos de uno de los servidores de tu dios. Elige un componente de alineamiento de los que tiene tu dios (caótico, maligno, bueno, o legal). No puedes lanzar este conjuro si careces de dios o si tu dios es neutral absoluto. El conjuro obtiene el rasgo del alineamiento elegido.
Si eras de tamaño Mediano o más pequeño, te vuelves Grande, igual que los efectos de agrandar. Tienes que disponer de espacio para expandirte, o el conjuro se pierde. También obtienes los siguientes beneficios.
• 40 Puntos de Golpe temporales.
• Una Velocidad de vuelo igual a la tuya.
• Debilidad 10 al alineamiento opuesto al elegido.
• Un bonificador +1 por estatus a las salvaciones contra conjuros.
• Visión en la oscuridad.
• Tus ataques sin armas y tus armas infligen 1 daño adicional del tipo de alineamiento elegido.
• Uno o más ataques cuerpo a cuerpo sin armas. Si has elegido bueno o legal, tus ataques de puño infligen 2d8 daño. Si has elegido caótico, obtienes un ataque sin armas de mordisco que inflige 2d10 daño perforante. Si has elegido maligno, obtienes un ataque sin armas de garra que inflige 2d8 daño cortante y tiene los rasgos ágil y sutil.
@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.GDzn5DToE62ZOTrP]{Efecto Mágico: Receptaculo Divino (Caótico)}
@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.evK8JR3j2iWGWaug]{Efecto Mágico: Receptaculo Divino (Maligno)}
@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.KMF2t3qqzyFP0rxL]{Efecto Mágico: Receptaculo Divino (Bueno)}
@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.tBgwWblDp1xdxN4D]{Efecto Mágico: Receptaculo Divino (Legal)}
Potenciado (9º) Los puntos de golpe temporales se incrementan a 60, la debilidad a 15 y la duración a 10 minutos.
@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.dIftJU6Ki2QSLCOD]{Efecto Mágico: Receptaculo Divino nivel 9 (Caótico)}
@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.AnawxScxqUiRuGTm]{Efecto Mágico: Receptaculo Divino nivel 9 (Maligno)}
@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.OxJEUhim6xzsHIyi]{Efecto Mágico: Receptaculo Divino nivel 9 (Bueno)}
@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.wKdIf5x7zztiFHpL]{Efecto Mágico: Receptaculo Divino nivel 9 (Legal)}

entries.name: Ira Divina
entries.description:
Puedes canalizar la furia de tu dios contra los enemigos de alineamiento opuesto. Elige un componente de alineamiento de los que tiene tu dios (caótico, maligno, bueno, o legal). No puedes lanzar este conjuro si careces de dios o si tu dios es neutral absoluto. El conjuro obtiene el rasgo del alineamiento elegido. Infliges 4d10 daño del alineamiento elegido; todas las criaturas en el área deben hacer una salvación de Fortaleza. Las criaturas del alineamiento elegido no se ven afectadas. Las que ni encajan con el mismo ni se oponen a él tratan el resultado de su tirada de salvación como un grado mejor.
Éxito crítico La criatura no resulta afectada.
Éxito La criatura sufre mitad de daño.
Fallo La criatura sufre daño completo y queda @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesta 1}.
Fallo crítico La criatura sufre daño completo y queda @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesta 2}; mientras lo está, también está @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificada 1}.
Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d10.

entries.name: Diviner's Sight
entries.description: You glimpse into the target's future. Roll a d20; when the target attempts a non-secret saving throw or skill check, it can use the number you rolled instead of rolling, and the spell ends. Alternatively, you can instead reveal the result of the die roll for one of the target's secret checks during the duration, and the spell ends. Casting it again ends any active diviner's sight you have cast, as well as any active diviner's sight on the target.

entries.name: Divinity Leech
entries.description:
You disrupt the connection between a divine caster or deific servitor and their deity, blocking their use of divine power. If the target fails its save, it is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}.

For the spell's duration, whenever the target casts a divine spell, you regain [[/r {6d6}[healing]]]{6d6 Hit Points} and the target must attempt another Will save with the following effects.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success Each target of the divine spell has an outcome one degree of success better than the result it rolled.

Failure The divine spell is lost and target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} for 1 round.

entries.name: Dominar
entries.description:
Tomas el mando del objetivo, obligándole a obedecer tus órdenes. Si das una orden obviamente autodestructiva, el objetivo no actúa hasta que das una nueva orden. El efecto depende de su salvación de Voluntad.
Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.
Éxito El objetivo queda @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido 1}  mientras lucha contra tus órdenes.
Fallo El objetivo es @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlado} por ti y sigue tus órdenes, pero puede hacer una salvación de Voluntad al final de cada uno de sus turnos. Con un éxito, el conjuro se acaba.
Fallo crítico Igual que fallo, pero el objetivo tan sólo tiene derecho a una nueva salvación si le das una nueva orden que va contra su naturaleza, como por ejemplo matar a sus aliados.
Potenciado (10º) La duración es ilimitada.

entries.name: Door to Beyond
entries.description:
Striking at thin air, you create hairline cracks in an unoccupied adjacent space that lead somewhere outside reality. Air rushes through the cracks, drawing Large or smaller creatures and objects of light Bulk or less toward the center. Large or smaller creatures in the area must attempt a Fortitude save at the start of their turn; creatures that move into the area must attempt the save on entering.

The cracks of the door to beyond are too thin for anything to fully slip through, but decompressive effects deal 4d6 slashing damage to any creature or object that ends its turn in the door's space. You are unaffected by your own door to beyond. You can Dismiss the spell.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is pulled 10 feet toward the door.

Critical Failure The creature is pulled 20 feet toward the door.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

entries.name: Downpour
entries.description:
You call forth a torrential downpour, which extinguishes nonmagical flames. Creatures in the area are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} and gain fire resistance 10. Creatures outside the area are Concealed to those inside the area. Creatures with weakness to water that end their turns in the area take damage equal to their weakness.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.LMXxICrByo7XZ3Q3]{Spell Effect: Downpour}

Heightened (+1) The fire resistance increases by 2.

entries.name: Draconic Barrage
entries.description:
You shape energy into one incorporeal tiny dragon (or serpentine creature) that flits around you. The specific dragon is random; roll [[/r 1d6 #dragon]] on the table below for each dragon evoked to determine which type of dragon you create. While the spell persists, you can command one of your dragons to spit a missile of energy at a creature within 60 feet by using a single action, which has the concentrate trait. This is a ranged Strike that uses your spell attack bonus and deals 1d6 damage plus your spellcasting ability modifier, with the damage type depending on the dragon. A dragon's breath Strike uses and contributes to your multiple attack penalty. Once a dragon has used its breath Strike, it winks out of existence; when you have no dragons remaining, the spell ends.

Draconic Barrage

d6 Dragon Breath Strike type
1 Copper or Black Acid
2 Silver or White Cold
3 Bronze or Blue Electricity
4 Brass, Gold, or Red Fire
5 Green Poison
6 Your choice of dragon As the dragon

Heightened (+1) You shape 1 additional dragon, and the Strike damage increases by 1d6.

entries.name: Dragon Breath
entries.description:
You spew energy from your mouth, dealing [[/r 5d6]] damage. The area, damage type, and save depend on the dragon type in your bloodline.

Dragon Breath

Dragon Type Area and damage type Saving Throw
Black, Brine, or Copper 60-foot line of acid Reflex
Blue or Bronze 60-foot line of electricity Reflex
Brass 60-foot line of fire Reflex
Cloud 30-foot cone of electricity Reflex
Crystal or Forest 30-foot cone of piercing Reflex
Green 30-foot cone of poison Fortitude
Gold, Magma, or Red 30-foot cone of fire Reflex
Sea 10-foot burst within 30 feet of bludgeoning Reflex
Silver or White 30-foot cone of cold Reflex
Sky 10-foot burst within 30 feet of electricity Reflex
Sovereign 30-foot cone of mental Will
Umbral 30-foot cone of negative Reflex
Underworld 10-foot burst within 30 feet of fire Reflex

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by [[/r 2d6]].

entries.name: Dragon Breath (Black, Brine or Copper)
entries.description:
You spew energy from your mouth, dealing 5d6 acid damage in a 60-foot line. Affected creatures can make a basic Reflex save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

entries.name: Dragon Breath (Blue or Bronze)
entries.description:
You spew energy from your mouth, dealing 5d6 electricity damage in a 60-foot line. Affected creatures can make a basic Reflex save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

entries.name: Dragon Breath (Brass)
entries.description:
You spew energy from your mouth, dealing 5d6 fire damage in a 60-foot line. Affected creatures can make a basic Reflex save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

entries.name: Dragon Breath (Cloud)
entries.description:
You spew energy from your mouth, dealing 5d6 electricity damage in a 30-foot cone. Affected creatures can make a basic Reflex save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

entries.name: Dragon Breath (Crystal or Forest)
entries.description:
You spew energy from your mouth, dealing 5d6 piercing damage in a 30-foot cone. Affected creatures can make a basic Reflex save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

entries.name: Dragon Breath (Gold, Magma or Red)
entries.description:
You spew energy from your mouth, dealing 5d6 fire damage in a 30-foot cone. Affected creatures can make a basic Reflex save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

entries.name: Dragon Breath (Green)
entries.description:
You spew energy from your mouth, dealing 5d6 poison damage in a 30-foot cone. Affected creatures can make a basic Fortitude save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

entries.name: Dragon Breath (Sea)
entries.description:
You spew energy from your mouth, dealing 5d6 bludgeoning damage in a 10-foot burst within 30 feet. Affected creatures can make a basic Reflex save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

entries.name: Dragon Breath (Silver or White)
entries.description:
You spew energy from your mouth, dealing 5d6 cold damage in a 30-foot cone. Affected creatures can make a basic Reflex save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

entries.name: Dragon Breath (Sky)
entries.description:
You spew energy from your mouth, dealing 5d6 electricity damage in a 10-foot burst within 30 feet. Affected creatures can make a basic Reflex save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

entries.name: Dragon Breath (Sovereign)
entries.description:
You spew energy from your mouth, dealing 5d6 mental damage in a 30-foot cone. Affected creatures can make a basic Will save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

entries.name: Dragon Breath (Umbral)
entries.description:
You spew energy from your mouth, dealing 5d6 negative damage in a 30-foot cone. Affected creatures can make a basic Reflex save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

entries.name: Dragon Breath (Underworld)
entries.description:
You spew energy from your mouth, dealing 5d6 fire damage in a 10-foot burst within 30 feet. Affected creatures can make a basic Reflex save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

entries.name: Dragon Claws
entries.description:
Vicious claws grow from your fingers. They are finesse unarmed attacks that deal 1d4 slashing damage and 1d6 extra damage of a type determined by the dragon in your bloodline.

Your scales from blood magic glow with faint energy, giving you resistance 5 to the same damage type.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.7zy4W2RXQiMEr6cp]{Spell Effect: Dragon Claws}

Heightened (5th) The extra damage increases to 2d6, and the resistance increases to 10.

Heightened (9th) The extra damage increases to 3d6, and the resistance increases to 15.

entries.name: Forma de Dragón
entries.description:
Recurriendo a poderosa magia de transformación, obtienes la forma de batalla de un dragón Grande. Tienes que disponer de espacio para expandirte, o el conjuro se pierde. Cuando lanzas este conjuro, elige un tipo de dragón cromático o metálico. Cuando te encuentras en esta forma, obtienes el rasgo dragón. En esta forma de batalla puedes tener manos, y puedes llevar a cabo acciones de manipular. Puedes Disipar el conjuro. Obtienes las siguientes estadísticas y aptitudes, sin importar qué forma de batalla eliges:
• CA = 18 + tu nivel. Ignora el penalizador a las pruebas de armadura y la reducción de la Velocidad.
• 10 Puntos de Golpe temporales.
• Velocidad 40 pies (12 m), volar 100 pies (30 m)
• Resistencia 10 contra el tipo de daño de tu arma de aliento (ver más abajo).
• Visión en la oscuridad y olfato impreciso 60 pies (18 m).
• Uno o más ataques cuerpo a cuerpo sin armas específicos de la forma de batalla elegida, que son los únicos ataques que puedes utilizar. Estás entrenado en ellos. Tu modificador al ataque es +22 y tu bonificador al daño es +6. Dichos ataques están basados en la Fuerza (por ejemplo, a efectos del estado @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado}). Si tu modificador por ataque sin armas es mayor, puedes utilizarlo en lugar de éste. Ver a continuación más sobre estos ataques.
• Modificador +23 al Atletismo, si tu propio modificador no es superior.
• Arma de aliento [two-actions] (arcano, evocación) La forma, tamaño y tipo de daño de tu arma de aliento dependen de tu forma de dragón específica (ver a continuación). Una criatura en el área hace una salvación básica contra tu CD de conjuro. Se trata de una salvación de Reflejos si no se indica lo contrario en la descripción de la aptitud especial de tu forma de dragón específica. Una vez activada, tu arma de aliento no se puede utilizar de nuevo durante 1d4 asaltos. Tu arma de aliento tiene el rasgo correspondiente al tipo de daño que inflige. También obtienes aptitudes específicas basadas en el tipo de dragón elegido:
• @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.ETgzIIv3M2zvclAR]{Azul} Velocidad de excavación 20 pies (6 m); Cuerpo a cuerpo [una acción] mandíbulas, Daño 2d10 perforante más 1d12 electricidad; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] zarpas (ágil) Daño 3d10 cortante; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] cola (alcance 10 pies [3 m]), Daño 3d10 contundente; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] cuernos (alcance 10 pies [3 m], Daño 3d8 perforante; arma de aliento línea de 80 pies (24 m), 6d12 electricidad.
• @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.H6ndYYYlADWwqVQb]{Blanco} Velocidad de trepar 25 pies (7,5 m) sólo sobre hielo; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] mandíbulas, Daño 3d6 perforante más 2d6 frío; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] zarpa (ágil), Daño 3d10 cortante; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] cola (alcance 10 pies [3 m]), Daño 3d10 contundente; arma de aliento cono de 30 pies (9 m), 10d6 frío.
• @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.rHXOZAFBdRXIlxt5]{Negro} Velocidad de nado 60 pies (18 m); Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] mandíbulas, Daño 2d12 perforante más 2d6 ácido; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] zarpa (ágil), Daño 3d10 cortante; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] cola (alcance 10 pies [3 m]), Daño 3d10 contundente; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] cuernos (alcance 10 pies [3 m]), Daño 3d8 perforante; arma de aliento línea de 60 pies (18 m), 11d6 ácido.
• @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.V4a9pZHNUlddAwTA]{Rojo} ignora el @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Ocultamiento} debido al humo; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] mandíbulas, Daño 2d12 perforante más 2d6 fuego; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] zarpa (ágil), Daño 4d6 cortante; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] cola (alcance 10 pies [3 m]), Daño 3d10 contundente; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] ala (alcance 10 pies [3 m]), Daño 3d8 contundente; arma de aliento cono de 30 pies (9 m), 10d6 fuego.
• @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.nWEx5kpkE8YlBZvy]{Verde} Velocidad de nado 40 pies (12 m), ignora el terreno difícil derivado del follaje no mágico; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] mandíbulas, Daño 2d12 perforante más 2d6 veneno; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] zarpa (ágil), Daño 3d10 cortante; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] cola (alcance 10 pies [3 m], Daño 3d10 contundente; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] cuernos (alcance 10 pies [3 m]), Daño 3d8 perforante; arma de aliento cono de 30 pies (9 m), 10d6 veneno (salvación de Fortaleza en lugar de Reflejos).
• @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.jtW3VfI5Kktuy3GH]{Bronce} Velocidad de nado 40 pies (12 m); Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] mandíbulas, Daño 2d10 perforante más 1d12 electricidad; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] zarpas (ágil) Daño 3d10 cortante; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] cola (alcance 10 pies [3 m]), Daño 3d10 contundente; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] ala (alcance 10 pies [3 m], Daño 3d8 cortante; arma de aliento línea de 80 pies (24 m), 6d12 electricidad.
• @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.DrNpuMj14wVj4bWF]{Cobre} Velocidad de trepar 25 pies (7,5 m) sólo sobre piedra; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] mandíbulas, Daño 2d12 perforante más 2d6 ácido; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] zarpa (ágil), Daño 3d10 cortante; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] cola (alcance 10 pies [3 m]), Daño 3d10 contundente; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] ala (alcance 10 pies [3 m]), Daño 3d8 contundente; arma de aliento línea de 60 pies (18 m), 10d6 ácido.
• @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.8aNZhlkzRTRKlKag]{Oro} Velocidad de nado 40 pies (12 m); Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] mandíbulas, Daño 2d12 perforante más 2d6 fuego; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] zarpa (ágil), Daño 4d6 cortante; Cuerpo a cuerpo [una acción] cola (alcance 10 pies [3 m]), Daño 3d10 contundente; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] cuernos (alcance 10 pies [3 m]), Daño 3d8 perforante; arma de aliento cono de 30 pies (9 m), 6d10 fuego.
• @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.OeCn76SB92GPOZwr]{Oropiel} Velocidad de excavación 20 pies (6 m); Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] mandíbulas, Daño 3d8 perforante más 2d4 fuego; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] zarpa (ágil), Daño 3d10 cortante; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] cola (alcance 10 pies [3 m], Daño 3d10 contundente; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] púas (alcance 10 pies [3 m]), Daño 3d8 perforante; arma de aliento línea de 60 pies (18 m), 15d4 fuego.
• @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.TUyEeLyqdJL6PwbH]{Plata} caminar por las nubes; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] mandíbulas, Daño 2d12 perforante más 2d6 frío; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] zarpa (ágil), Daño 3d10 cortante; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] cola (alcance 10 [3 m], Daño 3d10 contundente; arma de aliento cono de 30 pies (9 m), 8d8 frío.
Potenciado (8º) Tu forma de batalla es Enorme, obtienes un bonificador +20 pies (+6 m) por estatus a tu Velocidad de vuelo y tus ataques tienen un alcance de 10 pies (3 m), o un alcance de 15 pies (4,5 m) si previamente tenían 10 pies (3 m). En su lugar obtienes CA = 21 + tu nivel, 15 PG temporales, un bonificador al ataque de +28, un bonificador al daño de +12, Atletismo +28 y un bonificador +14 por estatus al daño con tu arma de aliento.

entries.name: Dragon Wings
entries.description:
Leathery wings sprout from your back, giving you a fly Speed of 60 feet or your Speed, whichever is faster. When this spell's duration would end, if you're still flying, you float to the ground, as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Feather Fall}.

You can increase the Focus Point cost by 1 to gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.K8vvrOgW4bGakXxm]{Dragon Claws} as long as the wings last.

Heightened (8th) The duration increases to 10 minutes.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.V7jAnItnVqtfCAKt]{Spell Effect: Dragon Wings (60 Feet)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.jy4edd6pvJvJgOSP]{Spell Effect: Dragon Wings (Own Speed)}

entries.name: Drain Life
entries.description:
You close your hand and pull life energy from another creature into yourself. This deals 3d4 negative damage; the target must attempt a basic Fortitude save.

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the damage the target takes, after resolving its save and applying your blood magic if applicable. If the target's Hit Points were lower than the damage you dealt, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to their remaining Hit Points instead. The temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

entries.name: Draw Ire
entries.description:
You cause mental distress to a creature, goading it to strike back at you. You deal 1d10 mental damage to the creature and cause it to take a -1 status penalty to attack rolls against creatures other than you. The creature must attempt a Will saving throw.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes half damage and the penalty. The spell ends at the end of the target's next turn. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.PDoTV4EhJp63FEaG]{Spell Effect: Draw Ire (Success)}

Failure The target takes full damage and the penalty. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.BsGZdgiEElNlgZVv]{Spell Effect: Draw Ire (Failure)}

Critical Failure The target takes double damage, and the status penalty is -2. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.4VOZP2ArmS12nvz8]{Spell Effect: Draw Ire (Critical Failure)}

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d10.

entries.name: Draw the Lightning
entries.description:
Calling out to the skies, you summon a bolt of lightning to strike through a foe above you and down into your weapon or your body, charging it with electrical power. You must hold your weapon or an empty hand aloft as part of this spell's somatic component. When you do, a bolt of lightning descends from a storm cloud in the air above your and through the target, dealing 3d12 electricity damage with a basic Reflex save. For the rest of the spell's duration, your first Strike each round with the weapon you held aloft (or with your unarmed attacks if you held an empty hand aloft) deals an additional 1d12 electricity damage.

The spell creates its own storm cloud if necessary, so you can cast draw the lightning anywhere, even underground. If draw the lightning is cast outside under a cloudy or stormy sky, increase the bolt's damage by [[/r {2d12}[electricity]]].

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.fCIT9YgGUwIc3Z9G]{Spell Effect: Draw the Lightning}

Heightened (8th) The damage dealt to the initial target increases by 4d12, and the additional damage dealt on the first Strike each turn increases by 1d12.

entries.name: Dread Ambience
entries.description:
In some places, it always feels like something is observing you, as if the very land doesn't want you there. Hostile creatures skitter about in the underbrush. Tendrils of mist try to lead you stray. Even the scent of the place is unwelcoming. Sometimes, this eerie atmosphere is a natural occurrence. Other times, it's the result of the dread ambience ritual.

To create this unwelcoming, intimidating aura, you must prepare the area with salts and herbs, traveling the entire edge of the area throughout the casting.

After you complete your ritual, anyone who enters the area receives a status penalty to saving throws against fear effects within the dread ambience.

Critical Success The sense of dread is particularly powerful. Every creature in an area takes a -2 status penalty to saving throws against fear effects. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.FT5Tt2DKBRutDqbV]{Spell Effect: Dread Ambience (Critical Success)}

Success The dread ambience succeeds. Every creature in the area takes a -1 status penalty to saving throws against fear effects. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.1gTnFmfLUQnCo3TK]{Spell Effect: Dread Ambience (Success)}

Failure The dread ambience fails.

Critical Failure The dread ambience fails, and the casters take a -1 status penalty to all Will saves for the next week. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.4Lt69zSeYElEfDrZ]{Spell Effect: Dread Ambience (Critical Failure)}

Heightened (7th) The dread ambience costs 750 gp and remains in place for 10 years.

Heightened (9th) The dread ambience costs 5,000 gp and remains in place for an unlimited duration.

entries.name: Dread Aura
entries.description: You emit an aura of terror. Foes in the area are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} and unable to reduce the condition.

entries.name: Dread Secret
entries.description:
You utter a powerful secret at odds with the fundamental nature of the target creatures. Choose a specific resistance or weakness that you believe one or more of the targets have due to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} or previous experience with the targets, such as resistance to fire or weakness to silver. If the information is incorrect for a given target, the spell has no effect on that target. Affected targets must attempt a Will saving throw.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes 1 damage of the type of weakness you chose (thus triggering the creature's weakness), or loses its resistance until the end of your next turn if you chose a resistance.

Failure As success, and the creature becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} from the revelation of its dread secret.

Critical Failure As failure, except the creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3}.

entries.name: Concejo Onírico
entries.description: Cuando Lanzas este conjuro, cualquier objetivo (incluyéndote a ti) puede elegir quedarse dormido de inmediato. El conjuro acaba para todas las criaturas que no eligen dormir. Los durmientes comparten un sueño en el que se pueden comunicar entre sí como si estuvieran en la misma habitación. Cada objetivo abandona este sueño compartido al despertar, y si todos los objetivos se despiertan, el conjuro se acaba.

entries.name: Mensaje Onírico
entries.description:
Envías un mensaje al objetivo de tu sueño. El mensaje tiene un solo sentido, y su duración máxima es de un minuto de habla (aproximadamente 150 palabras). Si el objetivo está dormido, recibe el mensaje de inmediato. Si no, lo recibe la siguiente vez que duerme. En cuanto lo recibe, el conjuro acaba y sabes que el mensaje ha sido enviado.
Potenciado (4º) Puedes designar como objetivo hasta 10 criaturas cuyo nombre conoces y con las que te has reunido en persona. Debes enviarles a todas el mismo mensaje; el conjuro acaba para cada criatura individualmente.

entries.name: Dreamer's Call
entries.description:
The target becomes distracted and suggestible, inundated by vivid daydreams.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's attention wavers. It becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} by its daydreams.

Failure As success, except that you appear in the dream and give a suggestion. This can be to approach you, run away (as if it had the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} condition), Release what it's holding, Drop @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, or stand in place. The creature follows this course of action as its first action after you Cast the Spell.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target follows the course of action for as many actions as possible for the spell's duration, and it does nothing else.

entries.name: Dreaming Potential
entries.description: You draw the target into a lucid dream where it can explore the endless possibilities of its own potential within the ever-changing backdrop of its dreamscape. If it sleeps the full 8 hours uninterrupted, when it wakes, it counts as having spent a day of downtime retraining, though it can't use dreaming potential for any retraining that would require either an instructor or specialized knowledge it can't access within the dream.

entries.name: Caerse Muerto
entries.description:
El objetivo parece caer muerto, aunque en realidad se hace @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. Deja un cuerpo ilusorio donde ha caído, con todo y una herida fatal creíble. La ilusión tiene toda la apariencia y el tacto de un cuerpo muerto. Si la muerte del objetivo parece absurda (por ejemplo, un bárbaro a tope de vitalidad parece resultar muerto por daño 2) el PJ puede conceder al atacante una prueba de Percepción inmediata para descreer la ilusión. Si el objetivo lleva a cabo acciones hostiles, el conjuro se acaba. Esto acaba todo el conjuro, por lo que el cuerpo ilusorio también desaparece.
Potenciado (7º) El conjuro no acaba si el objetivo lleva a cabo acciones hostiles.

entries.name: Dull Ambition
entries.description:
You curse the target to fail in all avenues of its life that require drive and ambition, as it inadvertently undermines its own goals at every turn. The effect is based on the target's Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success For 1 hour, the target rolls twice and uses the lower result on initiative rolls.

Failure For 1 day, the target rolls twice and uses the lower result on initiative rolls and any check to determine the success of a downtime activity.

Critical Failure As failure, but the duration is unlimited.

entries.name: Duplicar Enemigo
entries.description:
Intentas crear un duplicado temporal de un enemigo para que luche por ti. El objetivo puede intentar una salvación de Fortaleza para perturbar el conjuro. El duplicado aparece en un espacio no ocupado adyacente al objetivo y tiene los mismos modificadores al ataque, CA, modificadores a las tiradas de salvación, Percepción y habilidades que el objetivo, pero tan sólo tiene 70 Puntos de Golpe y carece de las aptitudes especiales del mismo, incluyendo inmunidades, resistencias y debilidades. No dispone de objetos mágicos excepto runas de potencia de arma. El duplicado obtiene el rasgo esbirro, y sólo puede dar Zancadas y Golpes. Sus Golpes infligen el daño normal del objetivo, pero no aplican efectos añadidos, puesto que carece de aptitudes especiales. El conjuro se acaba automáticamente si los Puntos de Golpe del duplicado caen a 0. El duplicado ataca a tus enemigos lo mejor que puede. También puedes intentar darle instrucciones adicionales; cuando Mantienes el conjuro, puedes también Comandar a un esbirro como parte de tu acción, pero es el DJ quien determina si el duplicado obedece tus órdenes. El duplicado es inestable, por lo que cada turno después de que lleva a cabo sus acciones, pierde 4d6 Puntos de Golpe. No es una criatura viva, y no puede recuperar sus Puntos de Golpe perdidos en modo alguno.
Éxito crítico No consigues crear un duplicado.
Éxito El duplicado inflige mitad de daño con sus Golpes y la duración se reduce a un máximo de 2 asaltos.
Fallo El duplicado funciona tal y como se ha descrito.
Potenciado (+1) El nivel de la criatura a la que puedes designar como objetivo se incrementa en 2. El duplicado tiene 10 PG más.

entries.name: Dust Storm
entries.description:
You call forth a swirling storm of dust. The dust storm obscures vision, with the effect of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Obscuring Mist}. The dust also makes the air unbreathable; creatures in the area must hold their breath, though wearing a scarf or similar clothing over the mouth increases the time the creature can hold its breath to 5 rounds. Creatures entering or starting their turn in the dust storm take 1d6 slashing damage. Creatures that have the water trait or that are made primarily of liquid take double damage.

Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

entries.name: Dutiful Challenge
entries.description:
As you challenge an enemy, you take some of its attention away from your allies. The target takes a -1 status penalty to attack rolls, damage rolls, and skill checks against creatures other than you, and you take a -1 status penalty to attack rolls, damage rolls, and skill checks against creatures other than the target.

Each time a creature other than you uses a hostile action that affects the challenged enemy, the enemy can attempt a Will save. On a success, the enemy no longer takes the penalty against that creature. You can Dismiss the spell, and it ends automatically if you or the target is defeated.

Heightened (+3) The status penalties increase by 1.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.UH2sT6eW5e31Xytd]{Spell Effect: Dutiful Challenge}

entries.name: Ligadura Terrestre
entries.description:
Utilizando el peso de la tierra, obstaculizas el vuelo de un objetivo, con efectos basados en su salvación de Fortaleza. Si la criatura llega al suelo de forma segura, no sufre daño por caída.
Éxito crítico El objetivo no resulta afectado.
Éxito El objetivo cae de forma segura hasta 120 pies (36 m).
Fallo El objetivo cae de forma segura hasta 120 pies (36 m). Si llega al suelo, no puede Volar, levitar o abandonar el suelo de ninguna otra forma durante 1 asalto.
Fallo crítico El objetivo cae de forma segura hasta 120 pies (36 m). Si llega al suelo, no puede Volar, levitar o abandonar el suelo de ninguna otra forma durante 1 minuto.

entries.name: Terremoto
entries.description:
Sacudes el terreno, haces caer a las criaturas en las fisuras que se abren y derrumbas estructuras. El DJ podría añadir efectos adicionales en algunas áreas. Los acantilados podrían derrumbarse, haciendo que las criaturas caigan, o un lago podría ser drenado, al abrirse fisuras bajo su superficie, dejando una ciénaga de arenas movedizas.
• Temblor de tierra El suelo se convierte en terreno difícil y las criaturas en él sufren un penalizador -2 por circunstancia a las tiradas de ataque, la CA y las pruebas de habilidad.
• Fisuras Cada criatura en el suelo debe hacer una salvación de Reflejos al inicio de su turno para mantener el equilibrio y evitar caerse a una de las fisuras de 40 pies (12 m) de profundidad que se abren a sus pies. Las fisuras son permanentes y sus lados requieren Atletismo CD 15 para Trepar.
• Derrumbe Las estructuras y los techos podrían derrumbarse. El DJ hace una prueba plana para cada una (CD 16 para una estructura recia, CD 14 para una estructura normal y la mayoría de formaciones naturales, CD 9 para una estructura de baja calidad, todas ellas pudiéndose ajustar hacia arriba o hacia abajo a voluntad del DJ). Un derrumbe inflige 11d6 de daño contundente; cada criatura atrapada en uno debe hacer una salvación de Reflejos para evitarlo.
Éxito crítico La criatura sufre la mitad del daño debido al derrumbe.
Éxito La criatura sufre la mitad del daño debido al derrumbe y queda @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}.
Fallo La criatura sufre el daño completo debido al derrumbe y queda @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada}..
Fallo crítico La criatura sufre el daño completo debido al derrumbe y cae a una fisura.
Potenciado (10º) Creas un terremoto enorme que puede devastar un asentamiento. El alcance se incrementa a media milla (800 m) y el área a una explosión de un cuarto de milla (400 m).

entries.name: Echoing Weapon
entries.description:
You channel magical energy into the target weapon, and the air around it faintly hums each time you strike a blow, as the impact is absorbed into the weapon. If a creature is wielding the weapon at the end of its turn, the weapon discharges a burst of sound targeting one creature adjacent to the wielder (if any). The sonic damage this deals is equal to the number of successful Strikes with the target weapon that the wielder made that turn (to a maximum of 4 sonic damage if the wielder hits with four Strikes).

Heightened (+2) The sonic damage increases by 1 per Strike (and the maximum damage increases by 4).

entries.name: Explosión de Eclipse
entries.description:
Un globo de oscuridad congelante explota en el área, infligiendo 8d10 de daño por frío a las criaturas en el área, más 8d4 de daño negativo adicional a las criaturas vivas. Las criaturas en el área deben hacer una salvación de Reflejos. Si el globo se solapa con un área de luz mágica o afecta a una criatura afectada por luz mágica, la explosión de eclipse intenta contrarrestar el efecto de luz.
Éxito crítico La criatura no resulta afectada.
Éxito La criatura sufre mitad de daño.
Fallo La criatura sufre daño completo.
Fallo crítico La criatura sufre doble daño, y queda @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Cegado}por la oscuridad con una duración ilimitada.
Potenciado (+1) El daño por frío se incrementa en 1d10 y el daño negativo contra los vivos se incrementa en 1d4.

entries.name: Ectoplasmic Expulsion
entries.description: You call upon tendrils of ephemeral ectoplasm to pass through the target and carry away a harmful psychic affliction. You immediately attempt to counteract a single effect on the target with the emotion or possession trait, or an effect giving the target the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} condition. If you fail to counteract the effect, you nevertheless set up a resonance that allows the target to more ably escape the effect on its own; for the next hour, the target gains a +2 status bonus to Will saves to shrug off the effect you failed to counteract (such as Will saves to shake off control by the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wU6hNzK8Yfqdmc8m]{Possession} spell).

entries.name: Ectoplasmic Interstice
entries.description: You force the Material and Ethereal Planes to partially overlap, creating a zone that causes incorporeal and spiritual entities to take on many of the aspects of corporeal creatures. Within the ectoplasmic interstice, incorporeal creatures cannot pass through solid objects or corporeal creatures, and they can manipulate and attempt Strength-based checks against physical creatures and objects. An incorporeal PC or other creature with a normal Strength modifier simply uses that modifier, but if the creature had a Strength modifier of -5, like most incorporeal monsters, it uses a +4 modifier instead, increasing its Athletics modifier by 9 accordingly. Attacks against creatures that are within the interstice overcome resistances as if they were by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} weapons.

entries.name: Efficient Apport
entries.description:
Walking over to an item to pick it up is so much effort. Whether it's your spellbook, a reagent, or a glass of wine, it's simply more efficient to call it to your hand. You teleport the target into your open hand. If you don't have a hand free, it falls to the ground at your feet.

Heightened (3rd) You can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 120 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

Heightened (7th) The range increases to 120 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 2 or less.

entries.name: Eidolon's Wrath
entries.description:
Your eidolon releases a powerful energy attack that deals 5d6 damage of the type you chose when you took the Eidolon's Wrath feat, with a basic Reflex save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

entries.name: Eject Soul
entries.description:
Your touch disrupts the connection between body and soul, possibly forcing the soul out of the body altogether. The target must attempt a Fortitude save. You can allow allies to choose the degree of success instead of rolling a saving throw.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} as its soul briefly loses its connection to its body.

Critical Failure The target's soul exits its body for 1 round. The target's body becomes Stunned. While its body is stunned in this way, the target remains fully aware in soul form; it simply can't consciously move its body (though the body makes basic instinctual defensive movements). The target's soul has the incorporeal trait, is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, and has a fly Speed of 60 feet. It can't attack, cast spells, or attempt any skill checks that require a physical body, and it must always maintain line of effect to its body. When the target's body ceases being stunned, the target's soul instantly returns to its body as the target wakes.

Heightened (+3) If a willing ally chooses to critically fail, it can stay in soul form for 1 additional round.

entries.name: Arco Eléctrico
entries.description:
Un arco eléctrico salta de un objetivo a otro. Infliges tanto daño por electricidad como 1d4 más tu modificador por característica de lanzamiento de conjuros.
Potenciado (+1) El daño se incrementa en 1d4.

entries.name: Electrified Crystal Ward
entries.description:
You create an @Compendium[pf2e.hazards.491qhVbjsHnOuMZW]{Electric Latch Rune} hazard on the target, creating a special crystalline lock on the object. You can also substitute your spell DC for any of the hazard's listed DCs. You can have only one such hazard active at a time, and if you cast this spell while a previous electric latch rune is active, the older hazard discharges harmlessly.

Heightened (+2) The hazard's damage increases by 1d12.

entries.name: Element Embodied
entries.description:
Drawing upon the deepest wells of magic in an elemental plane, you transform into a spectacular elemental. You can choose between an air elemental, earth elemental, fire elemental, or water elemental. Your battle form is Gargantuan, and you must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the elemental trait and the trait for the element you choose. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based if you choose an air or fire elemental, or Strength based if you choose an earth or water elemental. (This distinction doesn't change the statistics, but matters for the enfeebled and clumsy conditions, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +36 for air or fire elemental or Athletics modifier of +36 for earth or water elemental, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

  • Air Elemental fly Speed 80 feet;
    • High Winds (air, aura) 30 feet. Air within the emanation is difficult terrain for flying creatures that don't have the air trait;
    • Swiftness Your movement doesn't trigger reactions;
    • Melee 1 gust (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d12+11 bludgeoning plus Push 10 feet;
    • Ranged 1 lightning lash (range increment 80 feet), Damage 3d12+4 electricity.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.J60rN48XzBGHmR6m]{Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Air)}

  • Earth Elemental 30 feet, burrow 20 feet; resistance 5 to physical;
    • Spike Stones (aura, earth) 30 feet. The area is difficult terrain and hazardous terrain. A creature without the earth trait that moves on the ground in the area takes 5 piercing damage for every square of that area it moves into;
    • Rocky Toughness You gain 40 temporary Hit Points when you choose this form instead of 30;
    • Melee 1 fist (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d12+15 bludgeoning;
    • Ranged 1 rock (range increment 40 feet), Damage 4d8+6 bludgeoning.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.jp88SCE3VCRAyE6x]{Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Earth)}

  • Fire Elemental 50 feet; immunity to fire; weakness to cold 10;
    • Intense Heat (aura, fire) 30 feet. A creature that enters the aura or starts its turn in the aura takes 5d6 fire damage with a basic Reflex save against your spell DC. A creature can take damage from the aura only once per round;
    • Melee 1 tendril (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d10+12 fire plus 2d6 persistent fire;
    • Ranged 1 fire mote (range increment 60 feet), Damage 4d8+6 bludgeoning.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.lmAwCy7isFvLYdGd]{Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Fire)}

  • Water Elemental 40 feet, swim 80 feet; resistance 10 to fire;
    • Vortex (aura, water) 30 feet. Water within the aura that is part of the same body of water you occupy is difficult terrain for Swimming creatures that don't have the water trait;
    • Melee 1 wave (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d12+18 bludgeoning plus Push or Pull 10 feet;
    • Ranged 1 water spout (range increment 60 feet), Damage 4d8+6 bludgeoning.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.w1HwO7huxJoK0gHY]{Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Water)}

entries.name: Elemental Absorption
entries.description:
You absorb elemental energy, which you can release as a powerful counterattack. Choose air, earth, fire, or water. You gain resistance 5 to damage dealt by effects with the chosen elemental trait; if you choose water, you also gain resistance to cold damage. As usual, if a spell has a multiple effects, such as a spell that deals both fire damage and bludgeoning damage with superheated rocks, you gain resistance to only the effects associated with the element you chose. Keep track of how much damage you have prevented with this spell.

As a 2-action activity, which has the concentrate trait and the trait matching the element you chose, you can release the stored energy. This deals damage equal to the amount you've stored (maximum 30 damage) to one enemy within 60 feet, with a basic Reflex save. The damage type depends on the element you chose: fire damage for fire; bludgeoning or cold damage for water; bludgeoning or slashing damage for air; or bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage for earth. After releasing the energy, the spell ends. If you do not use the stored energy before the spell ends, the energy is lost.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.LldX5hnNhKzGtOS0]{Spell Effect: Elemental Absorption}

Heightened (+3) The resistance increases by 5 and the maximum damage increases by 30.

entries.name: Elemental Annihilation Wave
entries.description:
You draw elemental power from your surroundings, and combining it with your own magical energy, unleash a wave of utter destruction and swirling colors that deals 1d6 fire damage and 3d6 bludgeoning damage with a basic Reflex save. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines the area and other parameters.

2 (somatic, verbal) The spell is a 30-foot cone.

3 (material, somatic, verbal) The spell is a 30-foot cone. On a failed saving throw, creatures are pushed 5 feet away from you, and on a critical failure they are pushed 10 feet away and are knocked prone.

Two Rounds If you spend 3 actions Casting the Spell, you can avoid finishing the spell and spend another 3 actions on your next turn to empower the spell even further. If you do, the spell is as 3 actions, but the area is a @Template[type:cone|distance:60], and for 1 round, the elements linger in the cone, racing off into the distance and making approaching you difficult, with the effects of gust of wind.

Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 2d6, and the distance that enemies are pushed back if you spent 3 actions or 2 rounds increases by 5 feet on a failed save and 10 feet on a critical failure.

entries.name: Elemental Betrayal
entries.description:
You call upon the elements to undermine your foe. When you Cast this Spell, choose air, earth, fire, or water. Each time the target takes damage from a spell or effect with the chosen trait, it takes an additional 2 damage of one damage type dealt by the spell or effect. If you chose fire or water, the target also takes this additional damage when taking fire or cold damage, respectively, from effects or spells without the chosen trait.

Heightened (+2) Increase the additional damage by 1.

entries.name: Elemental Blast
entries.description:
Area @Template[type:burst|distance:10], @Template[type:cone|distance:30], or @Template[type:line|distance:60]

You gather elemental energy and blast your foes in one of the various listed shapes of your choosing, dealing 8d6 bludgeoning damage (or fire damage if your element is fire). This spell has your element's trait.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

entries.name: Elemental Confluence
entries.description:
You conjure four types of elementals who combine forces to form into a chaotic storm. The confluence has AC 28 and 120 Hit Points, weakness 10 to area effects, and immunity to bleed and poison. Creatures can move through the confluence; creatures within the confluence are concealed, and all creatures outside the confluence are concealed to creatures within it. When you Cast or Sustain this Spell, you choose up to two different types of elementals to act.

  • Air (air, electricity) The elemental looses a bolt of electricity from the confluence, dealing [[/r {4d4}[electricity]]]{4d4 electricity damage} to creatures within 20 feet of the confluence, with a basic Reflex save. This doesn't affect creatures that are completely inside of the confluence.
  • Earth (earth) The confluence gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and resistance 10 to all physical damage (except adamantine) for 1 round.
  • Fire (fire) Flames roar through the confluence, dealing [[/r {1d6}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} to those partially or entirely inside the confluence.
  • Water (attack, water) The elemental expels a powerful jet of water. Attempt a ranged spell attack against a target within 60 feet of the confluence, using your spell attack roll modifier. This attack ignores concealment granted by the confluence, and the elemental gets a +2 circumstance bonus on the spell attack roll against a target inside the confluence. The water deals [[/r {4d6}[bludgeoning]]]{4d6 bludgeoning damage} on a hit (doubled on a critical hit). This attack doesn't count toward your multiple attack penalty.

entries.name: Forma Elemental
entries.description:
Llamas al poder de los Planos para transformarte en una forma de batalla elemental Mediana. Cuando lanzas este conjuro, elige entre agua, aire, fuego y tierra. Cuando estás en esta forma obtienes el rasgo correspondiente además del rasgo elemental. En esta forma de batalla puedes tener manos, y puedes llevar a cabo acciones de manipular. Puedes Disipar el conjuro. Obtienes las siguientes estadísticas y aptitudes, sin importar qué forma de batalla eliges:
• CA = 19 + tu nivel. Ignora el penalizador a las pruebas de armadura y la reducción de la Velocidad.
• 10 Puntos de Golpe temporales.
• Visión en la oscuridad.
• Uno o más ataques cuerpo a cuerpo sin armas específicos a la forma de batalla elegida, que son los únicos ataques que puedes utilizar. Estás entrenado en ellos. Tu modificador al ataque es +18 y tu bonificador al daño es +9. Son ataques basados en la Destreza (aire o fuego) o en la Fuerza (tierra o agua). Si tu modificador por ataque sin armas es mayor, puedes utilizarlo en lugar de este.
• Modificador +20 a Acrobacias (aire o fuego) o Atletismo (tierra o agua); ignora este cambio si tu propio modificador es mayor. También obtienes aptitudes específicas basadas en el tipo de elemental elegido:
• @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.DliizYpHcmBG130w]{Aire} Velocidad de vuelo 80 pies (24 m), tu movimiento no desencadena reacciones; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one-action] ráfaga, Daño 1d4 contundente.
• @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.8eWLR0WCf5258z8X]{Tierra} Velocidad 20 pies (6 m), excavar 20 pies (6 m); Cuerpo a cuerpo [one‑action] puño, Daño 2d10 contundente.
• @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.phIoucsDa3iplMm2]{Fuego} Velocidad 30 pies (9 m); resistencia al fuego 10, debilidad 5 al frío y 5 al agua; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one‑action] zarcillo, Daño 1d8 fuego más 1d4 fuego persistente.
• @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.kxMBdANwCcF841uA]{Agua} Velocidad 20 pies (6 m), nadar 60 pies (18 m); resistencia al fuego 5; Cuerpo a cuerpo [one‑action] ola, Daño 1d12 contundente, y puedes invertir una acción inmediatamente después de un impacto para empujar 5 pies (1,5 m) al objetivo con los efectos de un Empujón con éxito.
Potenciado (6º) Tu forma de batalla es Grande y tus ataques tienen un alcance de 10 pies (3 m). Tienes que disponer de espacio para expandirte, o el conjuro se pierde. En su lugar obtienes CA = 22 + tu nivel, 15 PG temporales, un modificador al ataque demás 23, un bonificador al daño de las 13 y Acrobacias o Atletismo +23.
Potenciado (7º) Tu forma de batalla es Enorme y tus ataques tienen un alcance de 15 pies (4,5 m). Tienes que disponer de espacio para expandirte, o el conjuro se pierde. En su lugar obtienes CA = 22 + tu nivel, 20 PG temporales, un modificador al ataque de +25, un bonificador al daño de +11, doblas el número de dados de daño (incluyendo daño persistente) y Acrobacias o Atletismo +25.

entries.name: Elemental Gift
entries.description:
An elemental force fills your target, granting the target the swiftness of air, the ruggedness of earth, the sting of fire, or the flexibility of water, depending on which element you choose. Choose an element when you Cast the Spell. The target gains the benefit of that element as described below, and this spell gains that trait's element.

  • Air The target gains a +30-foot status bonus to its land Speed and gains a fly Speed equal to its land Speed without the status bonus. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.yke7fAUDxUNzouQc]{Spell Effect: Elemental Gift (Air)}
  • Earth While on the ground, the target gets a +2 status bonus to Fortitude and Reflex saves against effects that would Shove or Trip it, and to saves against effects that would attempt to knock it prone. In addition, the ground adjacent to the target is difficult terrain, and the difficult terrain moves with the target, though the target ignores this difficult terrain with its own movement. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.fLOQMycP5tmXgPv9]{Spell Effect: Elemental Gift (Earth)}
  • Fire The target's melee unarmed Strikes and melee weapon Strikes deal 1d6 persistent fire damage on a hit. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.5R3ewWLFkgqTvZsc]{Spell Effect: Elemental Gift (Fire)}
  • Water The target takes on a watery sheen, gaining resistance 5 to fire and a swim Speed equal to its land Speed. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.yq6iu0Qxg3YEbb6s]{Spell Effect: Elemental Gift (Water)}

Heightened (8th) You can target up to 5 willing creatures.

entries.name: Elemental Motion
entries.description:
You call upon your element to propel you, improving your Speed depending on your element. This spell has your element's trait.

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.iqtjMVl6rGQhX2k8]{Air}You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.qbOpis7pIkXJbM2B]{Earth}You gain a burrow Speed of 10 feet.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.q4EEYltjqpRGiLsP]{Fire}You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.D0Qj5tC1hGUjzQc4]{Water}You gain a swim Speed equal to your Speed and can breathe underwater.

Heightened (6th) You also gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speeds.

Heightened (9th) The status bonus increases to +20 feet.

entries.name: Elemental Sentinel
entries.description:
You place a tiny elemental wisp within a single object, usually a mirror, statue, or other mundane-looking item, to serve as an alarm. Shattering or otherwise destroying the object frees the wisp and ends the ritual's effect even if the object is magically restored.

Critical Success The elemental wisps inhabits the object and willingly serves you to the best of its ability. The wisp becomes aware of the target object's surroundings and can telepathically contact you with a range of 500 feet. It reports to you about intruders or other changes to the room in which it's located. You must tell the wisp what the criteria for the reports will be-for instance, when anyone not openly wearing a certain symbol enters the room or when an item is removed. The wisp has a +5 Perception modifier and observes the room using normal vision, normal hearing, and touch.

Success As critical success, but the range of the telepathy is 100 feet and the wisp's Perception modifier is +3.

Failure You're unable to harness the spirit. The ritual fails.

Critical Failure The elemental wisp is trapped in the object as with a success, but it refuses or is somehow unable to help you. The elemental might have extremely low Intelligence or simply be spiteful. Regardless, the object's reports are always misleading.

Heightened (4th) The range of the telepathic link increases, allowing the wisp to contact you anywhere on the same planet. Its Perception modifier increases to +10, or +12 on a critical success.

Heightened (6th) As 4th level, except the wisp can see invisibility, and its Perception modifier increases to +15, or +17 on a critical success.

entries.name: Elemental Tempest
entries.description:
Your spellcasting surrounds you in a storm of elemental energy.

If the next action you take is to Cast a Spell from your wizard spell slots that's an evocation spell dealing acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage, a 10-foot emanation of energy surrounds you as you cast the spell.

Foes in the area take 1d6 damage per spell level of the spell you just cast of the same damage type the spell deals (choose one if it deals multiple types). Combine the damage from both elemental tempest and the other spell against foes who take damage from both before applying bonuses, penalties, resistance, weakness, and the like.

entries.name: Elemental Toss
entries.description:
With a flick of your wrist, you fling a chunk of your elemental matter at your foe. Make a spell attack roll, dealing 1d8 bludgeoning damage (or fire damage if your element is fire) on a success, and double damage on a critical success. This spell has your element's trait.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

entries.name: Elemental Zone
entries.description:
Select an elemental trait: air, earth, fire, or water. Elemental zone gains the trait you chose. You imbue the area with the raw energy of that element, creating a zone that emits and amplifies magic of that type. The temperature might suddenly rise or fall, a storm cloud might form, and so on.
